languages.text: С самого начала варп-прыжка среди пустотников ходили шепотки о дурных предзнаменованиях, сопровождающих полет: внезапных смертях в экипаже, растерзанных трупах, острых тенях, шныряющих за переборками... Терранский день спустя загадка разрешилась самым жестоким образом — покушением на Вольного Торговца! Каким образом на борту оказался ксенос-друкари, придется разбираться позже — сейчас Лорд-капитану нужно защищать свою жизнь!

Since the very start of the warp jump, rumours of ill omens have been widespread among the voidsmen: sudden deaths among the crew, ravaged corpses, jagged shadows lurking behind the bulkheads... A Terran day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!
languages.original_text: С самого начала варп-прыжка среди пустотников ходили шепотки о дурных предзнаменованиях, сопровождающих полет: внезапных смертях в экипаже, растерзанных трупах, острых тенях, шныряющих за переборками... Терранский день спустя загадка разрешилась самым жестоким образом — покушением на Вольного Торговца! Каким образом на борту оказался ксенос-друкари, придется разбираться позже — сейчас Лорд-капитану нужно защищать свою жизнь!

traits.locale_text: Since the very start of the warp jump, rumours of ill omens had been widespread among the voidborn: sudden deaths among the crew, ravaged corpses, sharp shadows lurking behind the bulkheads... A day later, the mystery has been explained in a most brutal manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

A day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

A Terran day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

Since the very start of the warp jump, rumours of ill omens have been widespread among the voidsmen: sudden deaths among the crew, ravaged corpses, jagged shadows lurking behind the bulkheads... A Terran day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

languages.text: 自从这次亚空间跳跃开始以来，不祥的谣言就在船员间广泛流传——突然死亡的船员、被蹂躏的尸体、舱壁后潜伏的参差阴影……一个泰拉日过后，这个谜团以最令人发指的方式揭开了谜底：有人打算暗杀行商浪人！这些黑暗灵族异形是如何登上舰船，目前不得而知，需要事后分析才能得出答案。至于现在，领主舰长必须为自己的生命而战！
languages.original_text: Since the very start of the warp jump, rumours of ill omens have been widespread among the voidsmen: sudden deaths among the crew, ravaged corpses, jagged shadows lurking behind the bulkheads... A Terran day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

traits.locale_text: 自从这次亚空间跳跃开始以来，不祥的谣言就在船员间广泛流传——突然死亡的船员、被蹂躏的尸体、舱壁后潜伏的参差阴影……一个泰拉日过后，这个谜团以最令人发指的方式揭开了谜底：有人打算暗杀行商浪人！这些黑暗灵族异形是如何登上舰船，目前不得而知，需要事后分析才能得出答案。至于现在，领主舰长必须为自己的生命而战！

languages.text: Desde el inicio del salto de disformidad se han extendido los rumores de malos augurios entre los soldados del vacío. Muertes repentinas entre la tripulación, cadáveres devastados, sombras puntiagudas acechando tras las paredes... Un día terrano después, el misterio se desveló de la forma más atroz, ¡con un atentado contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente! Habrá otro momento para preguntarse cómo consiguieron entrar a la nave los xenos drukhari. ¡Ahora {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene que luchar por sobrevivir!
languages.original_text: Since the very start of the warp jump, rumours of ill omens have been widespread among the voidsmen: sudden deaths among the crew, ravaged corpses, jagged shadows lurking behind the bulkheads... A Terran day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

traits.locale_text: Desde el inicio del salto de la disformidad se han extendido los rumores de malos augurios entre los soldados del vacío. Muertes repentinas entre la tripulación, cadáveres devastados, sombras puntiagudas acechando tras las paredes... Un día terrano después, el misterio se desveló de la forma más atroz, ¡con un atentado contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente! Habrá otro momento para preguntarse cómo consiguieron entrar a la nave los xenos drukhari. ¡Ahora {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene que luchar por sobrevivir!

languages.text: ワープジャンプ直後に、ヴォイズマンの間で病の前兆が出たという噂が広まった。突然死に倒れるクルー、ボロボロの死体、壁の後ろに潜むギザギザの影…地球時間で1日経って、その謎は最悪の方法で解明されることになる…自由開拓者の命が危ない！異種族デュカーリが船に乗り込めた経緯への疑問は、また別の機会にじっくり考えよう…ロード・キャプテンよ、今は己の命のために戦うのだ！
languages.original_text: Since the very start of the warp jump, rumours of ill omens have been widespread among the voidsmen: sudden deaths among the crew, ravaged corpses, jagged shadows lurking behind the bulkheads... A Terran day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

traits.locale_text: ワープジャンプ直後に、ヴォイズマンの間で病の前兆が出たという噂が広まった。突然死に倒れるクルー、ボロボロの死体、壁の後ろに潜むギザギザの影…地球時間で1日経って、その謎は最悪の方法で解明されることになる…自由開拓者の命が危ない！異種族デュカーリが船に乗り込めた経緯への疑問は、また別の機会にじっくり考えよう…ロード・キャプテンよ、今は己の命のために戦うのだ！

languages.text: Depuis le tout début du saut Warp, d'inquiétantes rumeurs se répandent entre les cosmomarins : morts suspectes, cadavres mutilés, ombres sinistres se dissimulant derrière les cloisons... Le lendemain, le mystère est levé de la plus abominable des manières : on a attenté à la vie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! Mais il faudra patienter avant de savoir comment des xénos drukharis ont pu se retrouver à bord du vaisseau ; pour l'heure, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit lutter pour sa survie !
languages.original_text: Since the very start of the warp jump, rumours of ill omens have been widespread among the voidsmen: sudden deaths among the crew, ravaged corpses, jagged shadows lurking behind the bulkheads... A Terran day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

traits.locale_text: Depuis le tout début du saut Warp, d'inquiétantes rumeurs se répandent entre les cosmomarins : morts suspectes, cadavres mutilés, ombres sinistres se dissimulant derrière les cloisons... Le lendemain, le mystère est levé de la plus abominable des manières : on a attenté à la vie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! Mais il faudra patienter avant de savoir comment des xénos drukharis ont pu se retrouver à bord du vaisseau ; pour l'heure, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit lutter pour sa survie !

languages.text: Seit dem Beginn des Warpsprungs verbreiten sich unter den Raumfahrern Gerüchte von bösen Omen: Plötzliche Todesfälle in der Crew, entstellte Leichen, gruselige Schatten, die hinter den Schotten lauern ... Einen Terratag später offenbarte das Mysterium sich auf schändlichste Weise — durch einen Anschlag auf das Leben {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}! Die Frage, wie die Drukhari-Xenos an Bord des Schiffs gekommen sind, muss ein andermal geklärt werden — vorerst muss der Lord Captain um {mf|sein|ihr} Leben kämpfen!
languages.original_text: Since the very start of the warp jump, rumours of ill omens have been widespread among the voidsmen: sudden deaths among the crew, ravaged corpses, jagged shadows lurking behind the bulkheads... A Terran day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!

traits.locale_text: Seit dem Beginn des Warpsprungs verbreiten sich unter den Raumfahrern Gerüchte von bösen Omen: Plötzliche Todesfälle in der Crew, entstellte Leichen, gruselige Schatten, die hinter den Schotts lauern ... Einen Terratag später offenbarte das Mysterium sich auf schändlichste Weise — durch einen Anschlag auf das Leben {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}! Die Frage, wie die Drukhari-Xenos an Bord des Schiffs gekommen sind, muss ein andermal geklärt werden — vorerst muss der Lord Captain um {mf|sein|ihr} Leben kämpfen!

languages.text: Öte sıçramanın başından beri uçsuz erleri arasında kötü alametlere dair söylentiler yayılıyor: Mürettebat arasında ani ölümler, parçalanmış cesetler, bölmelerin ardında pusuda bekleyen sivri gölgeler. Bir Terra günü sonrasında gizem, korkunç bir şekilde ortaya çıktı. Hür Tacir'in hayatına suikast girişiminde bulunuldu! Drukhari zenoların gemiye nasıl çıktığı sorusunun cevabı daha sonra bulunacak. Lord Kaptan şu anda canı için savaşmak zorunda!
languages.original_text: Since the very start of the warp jump, rumours of ill omens have been widespread among the voidsmen: sudden deaths among the crew, ravaged corpses, jagged shadows lurking behind the bulkheads... A Terran day later, the mystery unravelled itself in a most heinous manner — an attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! The question of how the Drukhari xenos came to be aboard the ship will have to be pondered some other time — right now, the Lord Captain has to fight for {mf|his|her} life!
